extensionDesc.message: Stack of links built on top of bookmarks to help you accelerate information processing

pushActiveTabDesc.message: Save the active tab and close it

changeBookmarkFolderDesc.message: Link Stack takes over a folder to manage its data. All bookmarks in the chosen folder will be kept.

helpText.message:
Link Stack is a simple extension. It only supports three operations:
1. Use keyboard shortcut "Alt + Shift + 2" to save the current page into Link Stack;
2. Use the right-click menu "Save to Link Stack" to save the link into Link Stack;
3. Click a saved link in Link Stack to delete it and open it in a new tab.
